effect.full: This Pokémon cannot be paralyzed. If a Pokémon is paralyzed and acquires this ability, its paralysis is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

description.diamond-pearl: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.
description.platinum: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

description.black-white: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.

description.sun-moon: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Its limber body protects the Pokémon from paralysis.
